long_description: The intense, rich flavor of gently-dried organic figs, dates and apricots makes the Peeled Snacks GoFigure fruit snacks taste like an indulgent treat. The complex natural sugar of these fruits will help boost your energy levels and leave you feeling satisfied. No sugar, oil or preservatives added.
short_description: The intense, rich flavor of gently-dried organic figs, dates and apricots makes the Peeled Snacks GoFigure fruit snacks taste like an indulgent treat.
